alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 1:07PM PST until March 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, highest above 1000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Willapa Hills. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to an inch per hour above 1000 feet will be possible late Friday night through Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
